name: Bobaland: Chapter 2
description:
Controls:

  • WASD Keys to move
  • Space Bar to jump
  • Left Shift while moving to sprint
  • Mouse to look around

You were last battling the plugbie infestation in Bobaland. Now, you are onboard an aircraft headed towards King Plugby's kingdom, too weak to battle. Help DRVR-7, your newfound ally that saved your life, finish the mission you started in this action platformer game! 

Inspirations & Modifiers

  • Super Mario 3D Land Level Design: I was inspired to make levels that introduce new ideas, and add a twist to those ideas as the levels progress.
  • Don't Tap the White Tile: One of the levels in the game encourages the player not to jump on the white tiles, unless they want to fall into an infinite void.
  • "Stranger in a Strange Land" Modifier: DRVR-7, the main character of the game, is a futuristic robot facing the challenges of King Plugby's retro-style kingdom.

Contributors

  • Nirranjan Akilan - Programmer and 3D Artist
  • Ben Dahl - Audio

Pre-made Assets

  • Low Poly Boba Cup from my Bobaland game
  • Low Poly Red Sports Car from my DriverMania game

3rd Party Assets

  • Unity Starter Assets - Third Person Character Controller
  • TextMesh Pro
  • Unity NavMesh
  • Press Start 2P Font
